attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
"Currently there is a high volume of complaints in regards to the mis selling of payment protection (PPI). These complaints are taking a long time to be resolved and it is taking even longer for upheld complaints to be paid out.
In some cases this is leading to debt and in worse cases repossessions.
To resolve this, quicker action is needed and all activities stopped on accounts affected eg. charges, interest and threat of repossesion, until the complaint has been resolved."

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
